column4: i have just installed the banshee media player. the first time i used the program it worked fine. now when i try to start it up, it crashed before it opens. i have tried unitstalling and re-installing with no better results
what can i do in the terminal to check what errors it has?
tried removing the banshee settings in your home folder?
yeah. i have tried running "banshee" from the terminal but the terminal is just sitting idle
